Every element of the villa has been changed, and most importantly, though not particularly visually noticeable, the entire internal workings of the villa have been upgraded - a very important change which makes the day to day villa running much more economical and maintenance stress-free.
One of the best logistical features of the type 12 floorplan, apart from the exceptionally spacious interior, is the fact that each of the total four bedrooms is totally en-suite, one of the 4 en-suites being located downstairs, ideal for visiting guests or family.
The current owner has recently changed everything in the villa during a detailed and extensive renovation including full bathrooms with top of the range hygienic toilets, all bathrooms suites, floor and wall tiles throughout the villa, all doors, switches and power outlets etc. The entire complement of AC machines and ducts are new and has increased the number of AC machines from 4 to 7, for more efficient running.

About Pearl Jumeirah
Pearl Jumeirah by Meraas Development is a project with a lot of unique selling points.
Announced in 2010, this is reclaimed land right off Jumeirah which also applies Jumeirah construction by-laws on the peninsula. Even though it is located right off Jumeirah, it has freehold title.
The peninsula offers 300 residential plots and the master-development also incorporates a 90,000 sq. ft. retail area, a mosque, educational facilities and large open spaces.
Many different factors affect prices, such as plot size, location of the plot (sea facing vs internal), original price etc.']
